channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Slow Motion Editor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Slow Motion Editor

item.title: CVE-2021-25349|2024-08-03T20:03:05.365Z -- samsung%20mobile -- slow%20motion%20editor
item.description: Using unsafe PendingIntent in Slow Motion Editor prior to version 3.5.18.5 allows local attackers unauthorized action without permission via hijacking the PendingIntent.
